            &lt;div class="WB_handle W_fr"&gt;
                &lt;ul class="clearfix"&gt;

                &lt;li&gt;&lt;span class="line S_line1"&gt;&lt;a class="S_txt1" title="èµ" action-data="version=mini&amp;qid=heart&amp;mid=4095644857441078&amp;like_src=1" action-type="forward_like" href="javascript:void(0);"&gt;

                &lt;/ul&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
